title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: When setting the default value in a list box of a report parameter and subsequently modifying the default value, the originally set default value is lost.
OB: No default value is set in the list box of the report parameter. After modifying the default value, the OK button is still enabled.
EB: The list box should retain the initially set default value, even after modification. After modifying the default value, the OK button should be disabled.
SR:
1. Create a new report parameter and set the Display type to List Box.
2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc' and select 'aa' as the default value. Click OK.
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog and modify the default value from 'aa' to 'aaa'. Click OK directly.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
5. Verify the default value in the list box.
